name: Anti Cellulite Slimming Body Sculpting Hot Cream Firming Body Lotion
description:
Features：

ANTI CELLULITE CREAM : Slimming cream fights unwanted fat on the abdomen, thighs, hips and buttocks skin, eliminate the appearance of cellulite and burn away unwanted fat cells. 

MASSAGE CREAM : Slimming cream massage Lotion can be used alone through general massage of the target fatty and cellulite problem areas.It is designed to address fat in problem areas such as the tummy, flank, thighs and arms. 

 


Description:

How it helps to diminish cellulite?
It Intensely stimulates the burning of fatty cells, reducing the visible signs of Cellulite such as uneven skin with bumps on the surface. As a result your skin is visibly improved, becoming smoother, firmer with increased elasticity.  The cream enhances cell metabolism, increases energy production and improves micro-circulation, which significantly smooths, contours body and minimizes the appearance of cellulite. Reduces swelling and strengthens capillaries. The cream has strong warming effect which helps remove fat deposits from cells. 
How to use:Apply once a day on the affected areas and massage energetically for 15 minutes. use for 7-10 days. To maintain the results after the intensive treatment of 7-10 days, use 3 or 4 times a month.
INGREDIENTS: AQUA, SESAME OIL, CINNAMOMUM, MATRICARIA CAMOMILLA EXTRACT, CAFFEINE, CITRUS MEDICA LIMONUM

Package including: a bottle of cellulite cream.
